mention.text: san salvador , 19 mar 89 -- the salvadoran army
two reporters who were shot by soldiers in the past few hours in the capital and in the eastern san miguel department
soldiers in the past few hours
a spokesman for the army press committee
salvadorans who work for the british reuter news agency
navas , who were on a motocycle
a sound technician for canal doce television of san salvador
